name: Samurai Scratch
description:
Samurai Scratch is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay.
Top the leaderboard by using Scratch the samurai to slay monsters. How long can you live??

_____________________________________________

Starting tips:
  • Use Shift to Slow time to make enemies easier to target.
  • You're invulnerable during your attack animation. Use this to setup your next shot.
  • Using the spacebar to teleport back to the center can help balance yourself after going on a combo spree.
  • Try letting the enemies get closer before attacking. You don't want to get caught on the sides without a teleport!
